title: HARASSMENT VIA IMPERSONATING RIOT STAFF - Space Amoeba
body:
In game, a "Friend" sent me this shit while I was in game. It's unbelievable. I work so hard on my profile and I needed another S in Jinx that game to get M7. This person pretended to be riot staff and also insulted me. I forgot to delete them 2 days ago and 

(Space Amoeba)
hi
System message: Due to the decision of the Player Behavior & Justice, your account has been suspended for 2 weeks after this game.
hi
System message: Due to the decision of the Player Behavior & Justice, your account has been PERMANENTLY BANNED.

(Novalucis)
what do you even mean? i didnt do anything wrong

*this is where I realized he was trolling, my friend on discord recognized the name*

(Novalucis)
you are a loser
im trying to focus
reporting ya

(Space Amoeba)
hi
System message: Your noobiness has not gone un-noticed, and teammates are beginning to complain. For the sake of the community's peace we must ensure that you cease your play
lol
reporting me?
how
I'm not ingame
and it's just a little chat troll
gl with your game, btw
lol

(Novalucis)
how about when im in game, stfu
im posting this on riots public board u prick

replies.body: If you still have those chat logs, go ahead and shoot them our way in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Impersonating Riot staff is against the ToS, so with a little proof of what happened, we should be able to take action.

It's not like that, lol. There's a little bug that when writing ".                          " with a lot of spaces and in the end "SystemMessage etc.." in game on that person's chat it doesn't appear the name of the guy who said it, so it really shows up like a true system message.

A friend has done that to me too and it was funny, not impersonating any riot, just for fun. I then did the same thing to my friends :)

I can understand that you might be doing it as a joke between friends, but this has caused a lot of concern for some of our players. It's been decided that this is a bannable offense, so it miiiiiiight not be a good idea to continue abusing that system message.
got it. Anyway, isn't it better to fix it? Or do you use the same method in your own system messages? xD
